distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for keepalived fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-41184: fixed integer overflow in vrrp_ipsets_handler (bsc#1228123)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: ** DISPUTED ** In the vrrp_ipsets_handler handler (fglobal_parser.c) of keepalived through 2.3.1, an integer overflow can occur. NOTE: this CVE Record might not be worthwhile because an empty ipset name must be configured by the user.
notes.title: CVE description
